```{r}
#| echo: false
library(echarts4r)
issues_opened <- readr::read_csv("./data/issues_opened.csv", col_types = "Di")
issues_opened_chart <- issues_opened |> 
  e_charts(x = week_start, elementId = "chart1") |>
  e_line(serie = issues_opened) |>
  e_datazoom(show = FALSE)

issues_closed <- readr::read_csv("./data/issues_closed.csv", col_types = "Di")
issues_closed_chart <- issues_closed |> 
  e_charts(x = week_start, elementId = "chart2") |>
  e_line(serie = issues_closed) |>
  e_datazoom(show = FALSE)

prs_opened <- readr::read_csv("./data/prs_opened.csv", col_types = "Di")
prs_opened_chart <- prs_opened |> 
  e_charts(x = week_start, elementId = "chart3") |>
  e_line(serie = prs_opened) |>
  e_datazoom(show = FALSE) 

prs_closed <- readr::read_csv("./data/prs_closed.csv", col_types = "Di")
prs_closed_chart <- prs_closed |> 
  e_charts(x = week_start, elementId = "chart4") |>
  e_line(serie = prs_closed) |>
  e_datazoom() |>
  e_connect(c("chart1", "chart2", "chart3"))

 e_arrange(issues_opened_chart, issues_closed_chart, prs_opened_chart, prs_closed_chart)
```
